long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like kicking the ball around the field and scoring a goal? Perhaps, soccer its the favorite game of both boys and girls. Now, when it’s muddy in the streets, or there is no desire to run around the field under the burning sun, you can stay home and still have fun. You need to launch this game where you can become a professional beach soccer player. Here you don’t need to control famous soccer players, but your task will be to score a goal, preferably in a few kicks. To do this, aim for the stars that will bring you even more points.



To swipe Install this extension to play Beach soccer game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact with us support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
